title: “It’s a No-Brainer,” Says Wedbush Analyst Urging Apple (AAPL) Toward $30B Perplexity AI Deal
summary: Wedbush analyst Daniel Ives believes that Apple (AAPL) should acquire Perplexity AI, an AI search engine backed by Nvidia (NVDA) The Top analyst called this potential deal a “no-brainer” move to boost the tech giant’s artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities.

title: “Inconceivable to Me”: Apple Stock (NASDAQ:AAPL) Drops as U.S. Government Calls It Out
summary: The issue of where consumer electronics giant Apple would produce those consumer electronics is a thorny one. Trump advisor Peter Navarro called out Apple for moving too slowly in getting production out of China. The rebuke proved scathing to even shareholders, who sent shares down over 1.5% in Monday afternoon's trading.

title: Apple Inc. (AAPL): “What Do We Pay For Apple?” Wonders Jim Cramer
summary: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has become a regular feature of Cramer’s morning show over the past couple of months. Cramer has defended the firm but dismissed its stock buyback as inadequate. The valuation continues to remain on his mind as he commented: "What do we pay for Apple?"

title: Apple Should Consider Replacing Tim Cook as CEO, LightShed Says
summary: Apple should consider replacing CEO Tim Cook, analysts say. The iPhone maker’s struggles with artificial intelligence raise significant risks for the company, they say.

title: Apple prepares to release first upgrade to Vision Pro headset: report (AAPL:NASDAQ)
summary: Apple is reportedly nearing completion of the first hardware upgrade to its Vision Pro headset. The update is expected to include a more powerful processor and ancillary features.
